svg:
svgfile="japan/${USER}-card.svg"
sed -i "s|__AVATAR__|${AVATAR}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__LOGIN__|${LOGIN}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__REPOS__|${REPOS}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__FOLLOWERS__|${FOLLOWERS}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__COMMITS__|${COMMITS}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__PRS__|${PRS}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__ISSUES__|${ISSUES}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__XP__|${XP}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__LEVEL__|${LEVEL}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__DATE__|${DATE}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__TOP1__|${TOP1}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__TOP1_DESC__|${TOP1_DESC}|g" "$svgfile" sed -i "s|__FILLED__|${FILLED}|g" "$svgfile"
echo "âœ… SVG criado: $svgfile"
